customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
This poor hotel worker had an excess of work he had to handle. Not only did he need to clean out the trash within the establishment, but he even had to face monsters that had suddenly appeared while he was on his way to attract more customers... Of course, creatures of malicious intent were not as easy to sweep away as trash, and so he could only flee, venting to customers after regarding the day's ill-fortune...
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule — Mastery Talisman: The Elements Entwined — After both sides take Elemental Reaction DMG a total of 6 times, you will win the match.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...
